mapper.select: SELECT w.id, w.user_id, u.nickname, w.title, w.image, w.product_name, format(w.goal_amount, '#,#') as goalAmountFormat, ifnull(format((SUM(wh.amount)), '#,#'), '0') as ongoingAmountFormat,((SUM(wh.amount)) / w.goal_amount) * 100 AS percentage FROM user u INNER JOIN wish w ON u.id = w.user_id LEFT JOIN wish_history wh ON w.id = wh.wish_id where is_public = true and u.is_block = false GROUP BY w.id limit 9

SELECT w.id, w.user_id, u.nickname, w.title, w.image, w.product_name, format(w.goal_amount, '#,#') as goalAmountFormat, ifnull(format((SUM(wh.amount)), '#,#'), '0') as ongoingAmountFormat, ((SUM(wh.amount)) / w.goal_amount) * 100 AS percentage FROM user u INNER JOIN wish w ON u.id = w.user_id LEFT JOIN wish_history wh ON w.id = wh.wish_id where is_public = true and completion_status = true and u.is_block = false GROUP BY w.id limit 9

SELECT w.id, w.user_id, u.nickname, w.title, w.image, w.product_name, format(w.goal_amount, '#,#') as goalAmountFormat, ifnull(format((SUM(wh.amount)), '#,#'), '0') as ongoingAmountFormat, ((SUM(wh.amount)) / w.goal_amount) * 100 AS percentage FROM user u INNER JOIN wish w ON u.id = w.user_id LEFT JOIN wish_history wh ON w.id = wh.wish_id where is_public = true and completion_status = false and u.is_block = false GROUP BY w.id limit 9

SELECT w.id, w.user_id, u.nickname, w.title, w.image, w.product_name, format(w.goal_amount, '#,#') as goalAmountFormat, ifnull(format((SUM(wh.amount)), '#,#'), '0') as ongoingAmountFormat, ((SUM(wh.amount)) / w.goal_amount) * 100 AS percentage FROM user u INNER JOIN wish w ON u.id = w.user_id LEFT JOIN wish_history wh ON w.id = wh.wish_id where is_public = true and u.is_block = false GROUP BY w.id order by w.register_datetime desc limit 9
